content: wasp nest pattern by sophia orquiz level easy inspiration for pattern though it has not been scientifically proven to work many swear by decoy wasp nests to deter wasps from building nests in the area tricking them into thinking that another colony has already established its territory considering that my balcony and garage are magnets for wasps to build their nests during the warmer seasons i decided to put that theory to the test for this pattern you will need to know how to increase and decrease stitches you will also need to know how to crochet using the back loops only the pattern consists of the single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet stitch double_crochet stitch triple crochet stitch chains and the slip_stitch note this pattern will be worked in the round supplies needed h/8 5 00 mm crochet hook medium worsted weight 4 yarn i used acrylic 1 skein of light brown cream beige or any shade of color that resembles a wasp nest tapestry needle stitch markers scissors polyfil stuffing or scrap yarn if you do not have poly-fil on hand stuffing tool *when selecting your materials you may want to consider whether they can be washed or not please note you may sell finished product you may not post share or sell this pattern as your own i would like credit where credit is due if you have any questions or confusion regarding pattern please do not hesitate to contact me via email at mamasophs@hotmail com © 06/19/2023 sophia orquiz all rights reserved https //mamasophs square site tag me on instagram @mamasophsartsandcrafts
